structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Grant of legislative powers to fiscal courts -- Exception.
law.text: Except in counties containing a consolidated local government, fiscal courts are granted all the legislative powers granted to all cities for purposes of adopting regulations and legislation proposed under this chapter.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 152, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 86.
